data.title: EP2687794A3 - Refrigeration systems and methods for connection with a vehicle's liquid cooling system - Google Patents
data.meta_description: A refrigeration system using a centralized liquid cooling system of a vehicle to refrigerate or chill a removable object (food or beverages) comprising a compartment (120) in which the object may be placed;a chilled liquid coolant system having a connection through which liquid coolant is received through a coolant path from a centralized liquid cooling system (220) of a vehicle; anda heat exchanger (610) proximate the compartment and operationally coupled with the chilled liquid coolant system along the coolant path to transfer heat from the compartment to the liquid coolant.

Devices That Are Associated With Refrigeration Equipment (AREA)

Abstract

A refrigeration system using a centralized liquid cooling system of a vehicle to refrigerate or chill a removable object (food or beverages) comprising a compartment (120) in which the object may be placed;a chilled liquid coolant system having a connection through which liquid coolant is received through a coolant path from a centralized liquid cooling system (220) of a vehicle; anda heat exchanger (610) proximate the compartment and operationally coupled with the chilled liquid coolant system along the coolant path to transfer heat from the compartment to the liquid coolant.
